title: Endless Runner for RPG Maker
description: Duck, jump, and embark in a customizable endless runner mini-game!

title: Skip Video for RPG Maker MV
description: Unlock the power to skip videos in RPG Maker, offering you greater control over the player's viewing experience.

title: Stat & Skill Levels for RPG Maker MZ
description: Elevate your RPG with customizable stats and skills. Shape your game like never before.

title: Storage System for RPG Maker MZ
description: Expand your world by seamlessly integrating an endless array of unique storage containers into your gameplay experience.

title: Waypoints for RPG Maker MV
description: Explore your world with ease, unlocking the power of fast and convenient travel.
